com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
Class SimpleValue

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.SimpleValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
Value
public class SimpleValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements Value

Simple convenience implementation of the spi.SimpleValue interface. This class is not part of the spi - it is provided for developers to assist in implementations of the spi.

getStream

public java.io.InputStream getStream()
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                     RepositoryException
Description copied from interface: Value
Get the value as a Stream. This is expected to be used with values of type ValueType.BINARY (particularly, for content). It will also work naturally for ValueType.STRING. Conversion is attempted for other types.

Specified by:

The value as a Stream
